attributes.action: Follow the lead of Australia and tell Radicals who want sharia law to leave.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Australia has told muslims who want Sharia law in Australia that the best thing they can do is leave. These people chose to emigrate to Australia and so they should accept the ways and customs of the Country, I urge this government to do the same, If people wish to live in our country they should respect our laws and traditions and our choice of Religion if they dont want to do this then they should live somewhere where there is Sharia law and leave our country in peace.
